mapper.select: select bal.leave_id, bal.user_id, bal.leave_type, bal.leave_hours, bal.leave_hours_unit, bal.leave_dates, bal.leave_reason, bal.create_by, bal.create_time, bal.update_by, bal.update_time, bal.remark, bal.dept_id, bal.in_prj_flag, bal.leave_prj_name, bal.overtime_sur_Time, bal.annLea_sur_Time, bal.leave_begin_time, bal.leave_end_time, ifnull(wb.bill_status,2) as approval_Status, wb.create_time as applyTime, su.nick_name as orginHandler from busi_ask_leave bal left join workflow_bill wb on bal.leave_id = wb.bill_id and wb.workflow_id = 2 left join sys_user su on su.user_name = wb.orgin_Handler where 1=1 and wb.workflow_node_id in ( select swn.workflow_node_id from sys_workflow_node swn left join sys_workflow_node_checker swnc on swnc.workflow_node_id = swn.workflow_node_id where swn.workflow_node_checker_type = 2 -- 指定人员 and swn.workflow_node_check_type = 1 -- 依次审批 and swnc.workflow_node_user_id = #{userId} ) order by wb.create_time desc
